Package BridgeBuilderAdv

Class Engineer

java.lang.Object
BridgeBuilderAdv.Engineer
Record Components:
token - (engineer's token)
hardMode - (is under a boolean to determine what the difficulty for the Engineer selected is)
random - (RNG for the engineer)
public class Engineer extends Object
This Engineer Class below is the main code for the Engineer's side of the game
Author:
Adit Bhimani

  • Constructor Details

    • Engineer

      public Engineer(boolean hardMode)
      Constructor for the Engineer class. It initializes the Engineer with the specified mode (hard or not). Sets the default token to '0' and initializes the random number generator.
      Parameters:
      hardMode - the mode of the Engineer (true for hard mode, false for normal mode)

  • Method Details

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove(GameBoard board, int playerLastRow, int playerLastCol)
      Makes a move for the Engineer on the game board. The move is based on the mode of the Engineer (hard or not).
      Parameters:
      board - the game board object
      playerLastRow - the row index of the player's last move
      playerLastCol - the column index of the player's last move

    • getToken

      public char getToken()
      Returns the token associated with the Engineer.
      Returns:
      the Engineer's token
